author: Fextralife
description:
I Played BLOODLINES 2 - Hands-On Gameplay Impressions
In this Fextralife video, I'm going to be talking about my Hands-on impressions with Vampire The Masquerade Bloodlines 2. This is a game that we did a preview for earlier this year on the channel, and I think most people were either pessimistic about this game, considering the direction of it, or maybe cautiously optimistic about it at best. But not a ton of people were really excited for this game, myself included. A friend of mine actually played the demo in Gamescom and told me that it was her favorite game in the show, which caught me off guard, so I went over to the Paradox booth and decided to check it out.

Timestamp
0:00 Vampire The Masquerade Bloodlines 2 Hands-On Impression
1:16 Bloodlines 2 Demo
2:23 Noir Feel
3:00 2 Minds
3:51 Dialogue
4:57 Clan / Bloodlines
6:19 Exploration
7:21 Combat
8:32 Departure from the previous RPG game
10:17 Final Thoughts

Don't forget to like the video and subscribe to our channel for more!
title: I Played BLOODLINES 2 - Hands-On Gameplay Impressions
